meanings.sent1: The unforgot memories brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: The unforgot promise was still fresh in his mind.
meanings.sent3: The unforgot birthday surprise made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unforgot kindness shone like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The unforgot song played softly in the background.

meanings.sent1: She unforgot to bring her umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: He unforgot his keys on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The cat unforgot to meow loudly for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The email unforgot to mention the important meeting.
meanings.sent5: The teacher unforgot to assign homework for the weekend.

meanings.definition: To cause to not be forgotten
meanings.sent1: Her story unforgot the bravery of the firefighters.
meanings.sent2: The monument unforgot the sacrifices of the soldiers.
meanings.sent3: The movie unforgot to include a surprise ending.
meanings.sent4: His speech unforgot the importance of unity and peace.
meanings.sent5: The painting unforgot the beauty of the countryside.
